configurableConfig.description: Pick "Custom..." in the popup selection to use a particular browser edition or read from a variable.
configurableConfig.label: Custom

config.text: Treat text to match for as a regular expression
Untick to only consider the frontmost window

script:
readonly run_script='../../../../com.alfredapp.automation.core/safari/safari.tabs.not-matching.close/run'

if [[ "${popup_browser}" == 'custom' ]]; then
  browser="${custom_browser}"
else
  browser="${popup_browser}"
fi

"${run_script}" "${browser}" "${all_windows}" "${match_string}" "${regex}"
taskDescription: Closes Webkit browser tabs not containing specified text in URL
taskName: Close Webkit Browser Tabs Not Matching URL
